serviceOrganisation.name: Australian Bureau of Statistics
serviceOrganisation.description: The Australian Bureau of Statistics (ABS) is the statistical agency of the Government of Australia. The ABS provides key statistics on a wide range of economic, environmental and social issues, to assist and encourage informed decision making, research and discussion within governments and the community. (source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Australian_Bureau_of_Statistics)

serviceDimensions.name: ABS Stats
serviceDimensions.description: Access 33 key economic indicators including CPI, GDP and unemployment. They're all updated instantly as new data becomes available.

serviceDimensions.name: Run That Town
serviceDimensions.description: Lets you play an interactive strategy game with real census data. It puts you in charge of any Australian neighbourhood and challenges you to develop the area and make decisions that will sway popular opinion in your favour.
